name: Wendy Gwo
bio:
Wendy is a software engineer based in Los Angeles. She switched to software engineering after having previously worked as a consultant and as an electrical engineer. She loves all things tech, especially tech that can be used to make aspects of people's lives easier, meaningful, more efficient, and/or fun!

Wendy loves a challenge, and as a result has summited Mt. Kilimanjaro, has run the LA Marathon, and has a Masterâ€™s degree in Electrical Engineering. She loves hiking and being surrounded by the great outdoors and eating any and all carbs.
